description: Contains individual line items for each invoice, including quantity, pricing, and tax details.

columns.name: InvoiceLineID
columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for each invoice line.

columns.name: InvoiceID
columns.description: Foreign key to Sales.Invoices for the parent invoice.

columns.name: StockItemID
columns.description: Foreign key to Warehouse.StockItems for the product invoiced.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the item as it appears on the invoice.

columns.name: TaxAmount
columns.description: Calculated tax amount for this line.

columns.name: LineProfit
columns.description: Profit earned on this line item.

columns.name: ExtendedPrice
columns.description: Total price for this line (Quantity * UnitPrice).

columns.name: LastEditedBy
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for last editor.
